author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zeria Pharmaceutical buys back 150,900 shares for 345.4 mln yen in January
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Zeria Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it repurchased 150,900 shares of its common stock for 345.4 million yen in total from Jan. 1 to Jan. 31
* Says this was part of the share repurchase plan announced on Nov. 2, 2017
* Says it accumulatively repurchased 2.5 million shares for 5.08 billion yen in total as of Jan. 31
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/A5W6e7
